#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<limits.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
using namespace std;
int t,s,n;
int main() {
//freopen("ttt.txt", "r", stdin);
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d",&s);
n=0;
while(s>0)
{
 if(!(s%2))
{
    s/=2;
}
else
{
  s=s-1;
  n++;
}
}
printf("%d\n",n);
}
 return 0;
}
